title: Dark Vengeance looking for Players!
body:
EDIT: Sorry all, we've decided to close off the team :(

**Dark Vengeance** is looking for **Mid** and **Marksman** players, around the **Gold**-**Platinum** ranks (in solo queue) 
If possible Flex ranking to be minimum Silver.

Looking for people who are committed to improving, not only in solo play, but also as a team.

_**

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Working Microphone
- Able to join and use Discord
- Regular team practice times.

_**

We will not be accepting anyone who has a high ban history. Any member who has their account banned will be removed from the team.
It would be amazing if you lived in Western Australia to be able to participate in upcoming **RFLan** events found here: 
[Website](http://www.rflan.org) 
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/redflaglan/) 
Although it is not a major thing if you're unable to make it.

Once we feel confident enough, we can trail our skill within the OOL. 
We'll have trial times scheduled around our team time, and your availabilities!

Hope to see you on the team, and meet on the rift!

replies.body:
ADC main
I play lucian, caitlyn, ezreal, xayah, jinx, vayne.
Currently plat5 99LP(cucked by riot)
Available every night with a working mic n discord.
I play both roles if youre still looking for someone

Marksman main
Plays: Ezreal, Vayne, Draven, Lucian, Xayah. but am willing to learn the neccesary adcs
I have discord and am available pretty much every night
Add IGN: 'Stan' and hit me up wth the deets xoxo
Gold 4 support main, happy to sub, just want some more competitive practise.
I am a mid main and play lots of different play styles
